name: Tetris Building
description:
Tetris Building is an indie videogame that recreates the original tetris game by giving it a new approach.

In this game we will focus on creating the largest tetris tower, or achieving the most blocks in the scene.

Tetris Building consists of two game modes, 'Classic' and 'Wave'. In classic mode you will only have to accumulate the largest amount of blocks in the scene trying to balance them, while in wave mode you will have items that will fall and will benefit or harm the game, depending on the item.
